Name: The Flow Experience
About the game: The Focused Experience The Flow Experience is a game of focus and determination. Move, dash, and guard through enemy attacks to survive. You don't shoot. You don't attack. Just go with your instincts and stay alive. The Growth Experience Making mistakes is being human. Don't worry if you're getting beaten. Just trust your feelings, listen to the music. Follow the symbols of ancient civilizations and learn to improve. You will grow with every try.
